TopicTitle: Adding mods after completing tech tree, how to activate a bunch of parts at once.

Articles.Content:
Ok, I've completed the tech tree. Now I'm experimenting with Mods and adding various ones. This forces me to go back to the tech tree and "research" the part in order to add it to the VAB. However when there's a lot of parts, one has to manually research each and every part to add it. Is there anyway to add all the parts at once?

Edited October 2, 2014 by johnnyhandsome
Just felt like it.
There's a mod for that!
